install.name: Ninja RSS Syndicator
install.author: Ninja Forge
install.copyright: Ninja Forge and Body Health Debate
install.description: Use this module to display your feed buttons

param.name: msg
param.label: Message
param.description: Enter the header message for the module here.

param.name: feedid
param.label: Feeds
param.description: Select which feeds you would like to show in the module, for all feeds select none.

param.name: link_to_feed_icon
param.label: Link to feed icon?
param.description: Add the RSS feed icon to the header when module published. This will add a feed icon to the URL bar of your browser.

param.name: link_target
param.label: Open feed in new window/tab?
param.description: When the feed link or icon is clicked, would you like it to open in a new window/tab?

param.name: show_feed_name_text
param.label: Show feed name text?
param.description: As well as the feed icon, show the name as text next to the icon.
